Context:
George Brown College offers financial aid resources to help students pay for their education. Financial Aid services are available to all students and can assist with various financial needs. To learn more about financial aid and its requirements, contact FinAid@georgebrown.ca using your GBC email for identity verification. Services offered include assistance in learning about financial aid.

Financial Aid Offices are currently closed for in-person service but available via email. For general inquiries, students can use the ask.georgebrown.ca email or contact 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). The college's social media hub is another resource for students.

It should be noted that the information on this website is subject to change without notice and does not represent an offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. Additionally, there is a land acknowledgment to learn more about. Students can sign up to receive updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more by signing up on the website.
